g0ZLQaNPrmmAsMKYTP1CXQ.text: Brilliant sandwich shop which happily welcomes anyne. The man himself is a great laugh and will happpily make up any sandwiches for you. Wide variety available and all priced very well. Everything is clean and looks nice. Much better than Greggs across the road and i will go there for my lunch most days.

EvcFiiuTdSG5CR7D01ebow.text: Rudi's is Forrest's roads great rival to Greggs Bakery directly opposite. Although slightly more expensive gram for gram, you get a much more homely roll or sandwich at Rudis, along with great friendly service. One in particular to try is the focaccia with basil, mayonnaise and parma ham - delicious! You get good thick bread and a unique range of flavours to choose from, freshly made every day. Overall it is an interesting and tasty alternative to the more commercial Greggs over the road.

SfCAo5TsK0GMJIfM3DU0mw.text: only leaving off one star cos they don't put salad in the pastrami rolls i adore...best value for money on the block and considering there are at least fifteen places to purchase your lunch thats quite a compliment!
